63. Report Heartland Institute sent to inﬂuence US teachers on climate change
earns an “F” from scientists. Date published: 31 May 2017.
We thank four anonymous reviewers and N. Kada for their helpful comments and A.
Cooksey and L. D. Gaviria Jaraba for data collection assistance. We also acknowledge the
